author: glasser
msg: Implement the Text-copy-source-md5 field in dumpfiles, which has been
defined and even documented since the first revision of the dump
loader, but never used.  Let's catch corruption during loads earlier!
Doesn't require a format version bump, because unknown fields are
ignored; just be aware that the checksums will be not be checked by
older 'svnadmin load's.  Plus, this has been documented as part of the
(dump_node): When copying a file, write out the source's checksum.
(maybe_add_with_history): If a copy source checksum was provided,

author: lgo
msg: (diff_ignore_whitespace): write the new version of the file in binary mode,
otherwise the resulting eol change will give us unexpected diff output.
